channel.title: Make me some paint art?
channel.description:
Could someone do me a picture of truley adding safe zones.. It's really making me confused when people says:
First X = South-East 2ND X = North-East First Y = South-East 2ND Y = North-East
To me that makes same cords for first x and first y just that you use the x/y cords.. really.. REALLY confusing to me :confused:
Cheers, Wheaties.

item.title: Make me some paint art?
item.dc:creator: @Wheaties Wheaties
item.description:
@Wheaties wrote:

WooWw thanks alot mate

Read full topic

item.title: Make me some paint art?
item.dc:creator: @zilchuary zilchuary
item.description:
@zilchuary wrote:

[quote=“Infernal, post:2, topic:162605”]Now try to follow this image

X1 To X2 Will make the diagonal from Bottom Right to Top Left
Y1 To Y2 Will make the diagonal from Bottom Left to Top Right

These Create the square that your NPC will be walking, without always making the same course, he will walk randomly but always inside that square.
Remember to always mark the territory you want him to walk on:
First comes X1 - The Bottom Right Piece of the area
Them Comes X2 - The Top Left Part of the Area
After Comes Y1 - The Bottom Left part of the Area
After Comes Y2 - The Top Right part of the area.
Now, you have a fully created area ( A square in this tut ) that the NPC will be walking in!
This was made by me on my old acc, hope it helped ya[/quote]
IM CONFUZELD!

meh wered you get that pic or did you just copy and paste that lol

Read full topic

item.title: Make me some paint art?
item.dc:creator: @Infernal Infernal
item.description:
@Infernal wrote:

Now try to follow this image

X1 To X2 Will make the diagonal from Bottom Right to Top Left
Y1 To Y2 Will make the diagonal from Bottom Left to Top Right

These Create the square that your NPC will be walking, without always making the same course, he will walk randomly but always inside that square.
Remember to always mark the territory you want him to walk on:
First comes X1 - The Bottom Right Piece of the area
Them Comes X2 - The Top Left Part of the Area
After Comes Y1 - The Bottom Left part of the Area
After Comes Y2 - The Top Right part of the area.
Now, you have a fully created area ( A square in this tut ) that the NPC will be walking in!
This was made by me on my old acc, hope it helped ya

Read full topic

Could someone do me a picture of truley adding safe zones… It’s really making me confused when people says:

To me that makes same cords for first x and first y just that you use the x/y cords… really… REALLY confusing to me
